data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Hechi, Guangxi, China honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hechi, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Hechi, Guangxi, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Hechi, Guangxi, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 7,108 believers in Hechi, Guangxi, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Zhuang, Yongbei people.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Hechi, Guangxi, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Hechi, Guangxi, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Hechi, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Hechi
location.people_groups_list: Zhuang, Yang, Nunu, Zhuang, Guibei, Bunu, Mulao
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Zhuang, Yang (834,000), Nunu (64,000), Zhuang, Guibei (1,663,000), Bunu (432,000), Mulao (229,000)
